ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Realm Knights
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sela... Red Riding Hood... Robyn Hood... Van Helsing... Captain Hook... Shang... the REALM KNIGHTS have assembled for the greatest team book in Zenescope history!
Chaos rules as the insidious titan CRONOS rampages through the Earth, searching for his all-powerful scythes. Meanwhile, The Realm Knights journey into the Underworld and go head to head with the fallen god... HADES! Fairy tales and Greek mythology collide in the summer blockbuster event from writer Pat Shand (Robyn Hood/Unleashed)!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-15 17:28:15. [Issue ID 426929]
